title: Steve Albini, Kim Deal, Mike Watt, More Appear in New Indie Rock Documentary | Pitchfork
text:
Steve Albini, Kim Deal, Mike Watt, More Appear in New Indie Rock Documentary Watch a trailer for Where It Begins: 1977-2000 now Albini and Watt photos by Scott Dudelson/WireImage; Deal photo by Barry Brecheisen/WireImage 
Where It Begins: 1977-2000 is a new documentary that follows “the rise of American independent music through a midwest college music scene.” Directed by John Isberg, it features interviews with producer Steve Albini, Joe Shanahan, Kim Deal , Mike Watt, Ian Mackaye, and more. Check out a trailer for the film below, as well as a clip of Albini talking about finding places to sleep while on tour. Isberg and his team recently launched an IndieGogo campaign to fund the film’s completion, and tapped Jeff Schroeder of the Smashing Pumpkins to score it. Artists In This Story
